string.text: Do you have any special skills? %c[d_orange][Perks]%c[ui_8]
Hey, remember me your skills.
Yes, I know quite few tricks. Why did you ask?
Sure, ask away
I don't know you, it's not of your business.
What is your background?
Tell me about yourself.
Before coming to the zone
I had an interesting life until something bad happened, anyway
My past life is painful to remember, but I cannot forget who I am
Those were wonderful days unfortunately I had to leave everything behind. I still have myself though
I left my family because I could not stand them. Maybe it's because of who I am
Nice skills. Maybe we'll work together one day.
Well. I expected something better. Good luck out there (Unfavorite him).
Nice skills. We should work together one day (Favorite him).
Nice. Keep going.
All righty. Keep it going but don't sweat (Unfavorite him).
You are doing great. I should hold onto you (Favorite him).
Nevermind. Bye.
I don't have any skills. I was messing with you, haha.
%%c[d_cyan] NPC Goodwill:%%c[ui_8] \n%%c[d_orange]- General:%%c[ui_8] %s [%s] \n%%c[d_orange]- Personal:%%c[ui_8] %s

%%c[d_cyan] Squad:%%c[ui_8] 
%%c[d_orange]- Size:%%c[ui_8] %s 
%%c[d_orange]- Rank:%%c[ui_8] %s 
 
 We can always take some jobs if the pay is good.
What business do you have here? %c[d_orange][Squad Info]%c[ui_8]
%%c[d_orange]- Perk:%%c[ui_8] %%c[d_cyan]%s [%s]%%c[ui_8]
Sorry, we have other jobs already. Try again some another day (reset 24H).
Sorry, I have this job to finish first. Try again some another day (reset 24H).
